questions.quote: Well, I'm uh, I'm putting everybody's picture up in the lobby of our building.
Okay, what about a nice frame? With a picture of another guy in it. Frame says I care for you, but if you wanna get serious, perhaps you'd be interested in someone like this.
Oh come on. Have some compassion. Okay well I hope it's contagious
Jerry asked me to meet his girlfriend here. Did you here about his plane in Ithaca?
No! I don't! Don't you even care? This is your company! It's your name on the outside of the building! Speaking of which, the 'R' fell off and all it says now is K-uger!
I'd give him 24 hours to get out of it. They can't get out of it in 24 hours, it's a land rush.
Oh, I was uh, I was waiting downstairs for the jackhammer, thought I'd drop by.
Well it's a story about love, deception, greed, lust and...unbridled enthusiasm.
Kramer, are you out of your mind? You got the AIDS walk in like, three hours! You're never gonna make it!
You've selected ... Agent Zero? If that's correct, press one.
